amendment.description: Amendment offered as a substitute for the Wamp amendment (A018) sought to increase funding for the National Weather Service by $26 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the bill's funding for NOAA personnel to approximately $472 million (up $26 million) which is the Administration's request.

action.text: Substitute (A019) offered by Mr. Brown (CA) to the Wamp amendment (A018).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (CA) amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.
